title: The Royal Australian Airforce College
creator_credit: Geoffrey Thompson, Australia. Royal Australian Air Force and Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau
brief_description: A recruiting film. Shows life at the RAAF College, Point Cook (Victoria), and the extensive training of RAAF officer cadets.
